remarks: Closure of a group sum in a non-commutative monoid.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2018.)
statement:
gsumncl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` M ) $.
gsumncl.w $e |- ( ph -> M e. Mnd ) $.
gsumncl.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) ) $.
gsumncl.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( N ... P ) ) -> B e. K ) $.
gsumnunsn.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
gsumnunsn.l $e |- ( ph -> C e. K ) $.
gsumnunsn.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = ( P + 1 ) ) -> B = C ) $.
gsumnunsn $p |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. ( N ... ( P + 1 ) ) |-> B ) ) = ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N ... P ) |-> B ) ) .+ C ) ) $.
$d C k $.
$d K k $.
$d N k $.
$d N k $.
$d P k $.
$d P k $.
$d k ph $.
